question: The rainfall distribution pattern over the Ganga basin decreases following which of the following directions?
option1: From West to East and North to South
option2: From West to East and South to North
option3: From East to West and North to South
option4: From East to West and South to North
answer: From East to West and South to North
explanation: The rainfall distribution pattern over the Ganga basin decreases from the East to the West and South to North.
